Description.Text: Facilities The hotel offers guests a total of 395 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, a conference room and a business centre. Wireless internet access in public areas allows travellers to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. Rooms The establishment features rooms with air conditioning and a bathroom. A double bed ensures a good night's sleep. There is also a safe. Additional features include a fridge, a microwave and a tea/coffee station. A washing machine is also available for guests' convenience. Other features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a games console and WiFi. A hairdryer and bathrobes are provided in the bathrooms for everyday use. The hotel offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool is an enjoyable way to cool down on hot days. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. The accommodation offers a gym (for a fee) to travellers.
